short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the lichess.org tactics puzzle user rating before wasting time on it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever spend half an hour on a tactics puzzle on lichess only to find out that it really was not worth your time and had a user rating of -4000? Well, then this extension is for you. Damn Puzzle! will allow you to see the user rating of any puzzle before solving it, thus informing you whether you might be wasting time or not.
